page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: Our area is basically farm land but also covers a small residential district.This residential area was once two very small villages known as Trispen and St Erme.Six years ago a private housing estate was begun on land between the two villages.This estate has now completely joined the villages together.Building on the estate is continuing with a present phase of fourty eight houses under construction.Also being built at the moment is a development of twelve council houses. The farms in this block are mostly dairy but cereals are also grown as are some vegetable crops and early flowers. The block is close to Truro(3 miles) and most of the people living in this area use Truro for shopping and all the services this small city can{offer
